author: gumb00

ðŸ‘‹  Hey everyone,

The Ipsilon team is super excited to organize the EVM Summit during Devconnect and encourages you to apply to attend or submit a speaker proposal. It will be a one-day event featuring talks, workshops, and opportunities for collaboration among core developers, client teams, researchers, industry experts, and enthusiasts to foster more conversations, interactions, and collaboration around improving the EVM.

You can find more information and the main focus areas on the website and in the application forms. Both attendee and speaker applications are now open. ðŸ‘‡
http://evmsummit.org/

For more updates follow the event on Twitter. ðŸ‘‡
https://twitter.com/evmsummit

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or ideas about the event.
